::DrillBit:;

He smiles.
"Easy no, but its a good feeling. I like it. Plus whith the kind of bots
we have its more like a family then a army."
He remembered something he had gotton after the 'incident'.
He opened a hatch in his arm, and pulled out a ring, and slipped it on
her finger.
"I believe this was yours, love."
